meta.description: Design and motion system reverse-engineered from 25 sequential frames of an architecture portfolio page.
meta.source_frames_ordering: Filenames ezgif-frame-003 ... ezgif-frame-0xx sorted ascending are treated as a timeline.
meta.overall_style: Minimalist, editorial layout with oversized typography, neutral palette, and hero-scale imagery.

grid.notes: Hero text spans centered 8/12 columns with generous side margins; imagery bands often run edge-to-edge while text blocks remain within the grid. Project detail galleries use 12-column full bleed rows with 2-3 images each occupying 4-6 columns.

projects_overview.notes: Cards float in overlapping positions with angled rotation, ~32px vertical gaps and generous white space; large translucent typographic backdrop ('PROJECTS') spans the section.

project_detail.layout_pattern: full-width hero image then narrow text column

about.notes: Centered headline followed by a boxed paragraph block; all content sits within mid-page width with ample top/bottom breathing room.

contact.notes: Not fully visible; infer right-aligned call-to-action button with supporting text or contact details beside a compact form.

usage.notes: Overall feel is very airy with consistent vertical rhythm; sections breathe with ~96px top/bottom spacing and content stacks with even 16–32px increments.

primary.name_or_style: Geometric grotesque sans, likely similar to Neue Haas Grotesk or Inter

secondary.name_or_style: Condensed uppercase sans used for chips and nav links

usage_rules.page_titles: Use display or h1 weights in uppercase, centered or slightly left of center, often paired with animated mask effects.
usage_rules.project_titles: Use h2 uppercase centered above galleries; underline or thin dividers are not used, whitespace separates elements.
usage_rules.body_text: Maintain ~60ch max-width, center-aligned in hero/about, left-aligned for project descriptions.
usage_rules.meta_labels: All caps captions with increased letter spacing, usually inside pill chips.

usage_rules.backgrounds: Pure white dominates; alternate light grey panels reserve for hover/transition overlays and loading states.
usage_rules.text: Primary headings and body text use near-black; muted grey for supporting copy, navigation, and labels.
usage_rules.links_and_cta: Buttons use outline black stroke with white fill; hover fills with soft grey tint while maintaining black text.
usage_rules.over_image: Text placed over imagery leverages semi-opaque white chips or stays off-image to keep readability.

navbar.behavior: Logo and links remain top-aligned; on scroll, nav gains subtle white backdrop and hairline bottom border for contrast.

hover.observed_from_frames: Outline button gains light grey fill and subtle scale-up when hovered (ezgif-frame-018 → 019).

project_card.hover_behavior: Cards rise and rotate minutely back to level, image scales up ~5%, and chip gains higher contrast (ezgif-frame-006 → 010).
project_card.spacing: Image edges flush; text chip overlaps lower left with ~12px inset from image edge.

image_gallery.behavior: Static multi-column grid; images fade in sequentially on scroll and maintain equal gutter spacing.

forms.notes: Wide spacing between fields (~16px); focus state likely adds dark underline and uppercase label accent.

radii.notes: All containers and imagery use sharp corners; only chips and CTAs feature rounded pill treatment.

examples.card_shadow: 0 12px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.08) during hover on floating project cards.

borders.notes: Applied to navbar separation on scroll, button outlines, and occasional content boxes.

animations.page_transitions: Loading screen replaces O with rotating project image while headline fades in.
animations.on_scroll: Large typographic layers scale/translate masking effect; images slide upward with slight rotation correction; text blocks fade in with vertical offset.
animations.interaction: Buttons tint and scale; project cards un-tilt and zoom; chips brighten subtly.
frame_based_observations: ezgif-frame-003 → 007: Hero headline reveals via horizontal mask sweep while background type scales.
ezgif-frame-008 → 012: Project cards slide diagonally and straighten as the section comes into view.
ezgif-frame-020 → 024: Gallery images fade in sequential columns while location chip stays fixed at top center.

imagery.subjects: Architecture photography, interiors, exteriors, pools, minimalist residential spaces.
imagery.style: Natural daylight, neutral color grading, high dynamic range with clean compositions.

treatments.overlays: No overlays; occasional masked crops animate across typography.

rules: Use generous whitespace around key sections and project imagery.
Limit accent colors to maintain a restrained, architectural feel.
Keep typography system tight: 1 primary sans-serif, optional secondary type only for emphasis.
Align all elements to a strict grid; avoid arbitrary offsets.
Let imagery and layout tell the story; UI chrome remains understated.
Animations should be subtle and smooth, supporting content rather than distracting from it.
